GSD.description: Security researcher Seif Elsallamy reportedly found an exposed email endpoint for Uber that allows email to be sent as from @uber.com that is SPF neutral (uber.com uses ~all and does not require strict SPF compliance) and DKIM and DMARC compliant. Ax Sharma of BLEEPINGCOMPUTER reported on the issue and included screenshots and statements that test email swere sent to validate the issue.
